name: Evangelyze Communications
overview: Evangelyze Communications (EC) is a global voice and unified communications products and professional services organization that specializes in Microsoft Unified Communications IP telephony products and services. EC is comprised of award-winning and internationally-renowned experts, whose research, development, and publications have been widely distributed and highly regarded within the Information Technology industry, enabling the organization to become a leading global Microsoft Voice Partner as part of the Microsoft Voice Specialized Partner (VSP) Program and as a Value Added Reseller (VAR). EC’s elite professional services division provides pre-sales and technical consulting to Global 500 and Fortune 500 organizations with the vision and realization of Voice and Unified Communications products and solutions that provide business value, not just technological advancements. The Evangelyze Communications Research & Development division is focused on investing in development of new voice communications and collaboration technologies and continues to build on this success with the development of innovative voice & unified communications products and services, increasing market share to Microsoft and its partners worldwide, while increasing EC brand recognition.
